introduction.heading: Choose your activities
introduction.sub-heading: Find activities that can help you get work
introduction.action-overview-1: You'll see a list of activities that you could try out.
introduction.action-overview-2: There's lots of different things to try. They have all helped people find work - see which ones are right for you.
introduction.action-2: Pick an activity and say whether you're interested or not
introduction.action-3: Get more information about all the activities you're interested in at the end.
introduction.post-action-overview: Your choices will all be saved - you can leave and come back any time.

unsorted-activities.heading: Sort these activities
unsorted-activities.action-overview: Choose an activity from the list below, then decide whether it's right for you. When you're finished, you'll be able to go over your choices and find out more about the activities.
unsorted-activities.action-finish-detail: You can find out more or rearrange the activities on the next page.

ACT-4.title: List the biggest companies in the field you want to work in

ACT-6.title: Figure out your local public transport options – see how far you can get in an hour or 90 minutes

ACT-7.title: Find out what makes a good job application

ACT-8.title: Write down what you learnt last time you applied for a job

ACT-9.title: Ask for feedback on some jobs you've applied for

ACT-10.title: Update your CV for jobs you're interested in

ACT-11.title: Get a friend to look at your CV for you

ACT-13.title: Find out how social media websites like LinkedIn can help with your search

ACT-14.title: Sign up for a few more job search websites

ACT-15.title: Plan your work search for the week

ACT-16.title: Make a list of a few jobs you’d like in a year from now and the skills you need for them

ACT-17.title: Find a qualification that could improve your chances of getting jobs you want

ACT-18.title: Use a website to check what skills you've got

ACT-19.title: Do you need to do anything about the basics - maths or English?

ACT-20.title: Visit the job fair next week
